devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: There may be duplicates in the info provided by the getters defined hereThis contract is an authorized fork of Angle's `Getters` contract https://github.com/AngleProtocol/angle-transmuter/blob/main/contracts/monetizer/facets/Getters.sol

SafeCastOverflowedUintDowncast(uint8,uin.details: Value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

getCollateralRatio().details: This function may revert and overflow if the collateral ratio is too big due to a too small amount of `stablecoinsIssued`. Due to this, it is recommended to initialize the system with a non negligible amount of `stablecoinsIssued` so DoS attacks on redemptions which use this function become economically impossible

returns.oracleData: Extra data needed to read the oracle. For Chainlink oracles, this data is supposed to give the addresses of the Chainlink feeds to read, the stale periods for each feed, ...
returns.oracleType: Type of oracle (Chainlink, external smart contract, ...)
returns.targetData: Extra data needed to read the target price of the asset
returns.targetType: Type passed to read the value of the target price

getOracleValues(address).details: This function is not optimized for gas consumption as for instance the `burn` value for collateral is computed twice: once in `readBurn` and once in `getBurnOracle`

returns.burn: Oracle value that will be used for `collateral` for a burn transaction. This value is then used along with oracle values for all other collateral assets to get a global burn value for the oracle
returns.minRatio: Minimum ratio across all collateral assets between a collateral burn price and its target price. This value is independent of `collateral` and is used to normalize the burn oracle value for burn transactions.
returns.mint: Oracle value to be used for a mint transaction with `collateral`
returns.ratio: Ratio, in base `10**18` between the oracle value of the `collateral` and its target price. This value is 10**18 if the oracle is greater than the collateral price
returns.redemption: Oracle value that would be used to price `collateral` when computing the collateral ratio during a redemption

isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

isWhitelistedForCollateral(address,addre.details: This function is non view as it may consult external non view functions from whitelist providers

isWhitelistedForType(uint8,address).details: Note that ultimately whitelisting may depend as well on external providers

devdoc.title: Getters

accessManager().notice: Returns the address of the `accessManager` contract

getCollateralBurnFees(address).notice: Returns the `xFee` and `yFee` arrays from which fees are computed when coming to burn for `collateral`

getCollateralDecimals(address).notice: Returns the decimals of a given `collateral`

getCollateralInfo(address).notice: Returns all the info in storage associated to a `collateral`

getCollateralList().notice: Returns the list of collateral assets supported by the system

getCollateralMintFees(address).notice: Returns the `xFee` and `yFee` arrays from which fees are computed when coming to mint with `collateral`

getCollateralRatio().notice: Returns the collateral ratio of Monetizer in base `10**9` and a rounded version of the total amount of stablecoins issued

getCollateralWhitelistData(address).notice: Gets the data needed to deal with whitelists for `collateral`

getIssuedByCollateral(address).notice: Returns the amount of stablecoins issued from `collateral` and the total amount of stablecoins issued through Monetizer

getManagerData(address).notice: Returns if a collateral is "managed" and the associated manager configuration

getOracle(address).notice: Returns the data used to compute oracle values for `collateral`

getOracleValues(address).notice: Returns the oracle values associated to `collateral`

getRedemptionFees().notice: Returns the `xFee` and `yFee` arrays used to compute the penalty factor depending on the collateral ratio when users come to redeem

getTotalIssued().notice: Returns the total amount of stablecoins issued through Monetizer

isPaused(address,uint8).notice: Returns if the associated functionality is paused or not

isTrusted(address).notice: Returns if `sender` is trusted to update normalizers

isTrustedSeller(address).notice: Returns if `sender` is trusted to update sell rewards

isValidSelector(bytes4).notice: Checks whether a given `selector` is actually a valid selector corresponding to a function in one of the facets of the proxy

isWhitelistedCollateral(address).notice: Checks whether only whitelisted address can deal with `collateral` during burns and redemptions

isWhitelistedForCollateral(address,addre.notice: Checks whether `sender` can deal with `collateral` during burns and redemptions

isWhitelistedForType(uint8,address).notice: Checks whether `sender` has a non null entry in the `isWhitelistedForType` storage mapping
